QuestData.Title: Tomb of Sargeras: Aegwynn's Path
QuestData.Description: As we sealed the tomb, I entrusted the final piece of Sargeras' prison to the Maiden of Vigilance. If you had it you could move freely throughout the tomb, but I know not what became of the keeper and fear the worst.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Fragment of the Guardian's Seal from the Maiden of Vigilance in the Tomb of Sargeras on Normal Difficulty.
